base_description: Brown rectangular cabinet with modern handles.
part_description: Cabinet includes one drawer and one door, both with silver handles; drawer on top, door below.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides in and out smoothly, supported by internal rails. The door pivots on hinges, allowing it to swing open and closed. Both parts are secured with handles for easy access, ensuring efficient use of internal storage space.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet interacts with the environment by providing storage space, easily accessed via the handles. It can be placed in kitchens or bathrooms, complementing modern decor. Users interact by pulling the handles to open the drawer or door, accessing stored items.
